caption: Authorization
description: Authorization events report privileges or groups assigned to a user or user session.
name: authorization

actor.description: The actor that performed the authorization grant or revocation.

dst_endpoint.description: The Endpoint for which the authorization was targeted.

group.description: The group to which new privileges, groups or roles were assigned or removed.

assigned_groups.description: The list of groups or roles that were assigned to a user, user session, or group.

privileges.description: The list of privileges assigned to the user, user session, or group.

resource.description: The resource that was the target of the authorization change.

user.description: The user to which new privileges, groups or roles were assigned or removed.
